name: Zephyr's Fleetness
text: You can call upon the spirits of the air to grant agility to your allies. Each target gains a +30 foot enhancement bonus to its land speed and fly speed (if any). Each target can also move (and charge) through difficult terrain without penalty.
savingThrow_zh: 意志, 通过则无效 (无害)
text_zh: 你可以召唤天空的精魂为你的盟友提供敏捷之力。每个受术者的陆地速度和飞行速度（如果有的话）会获得+30英尺增强加值，同时可以非常容易地通过困难地形进行移动和冲锋，而且不受惩罚。
